post:
Hello,

Selling the following...

Specifications: Dell R210 II 1U Rack Server, i3-2100 @ 3.1GHz, 4GB RAM, 500GB 7.2k 3.5" Hard Drive. Rack rails are included with this sale. This server was purchased with the Dell 1 year warranty, and has till July left. (expires around the 11th July). This server will be pulled from a datacenter, however it's hardly been used at all as it was an "impulse buy". It's been powered on, but it's been mainly sitting idle.

I am looking for **£185-£195** for this + delivery (£10-£15 via courier to UK only), and I am open to negotiation as I want to sell this. I can be contacted via this thread or via a PM.

If required, I can email interested persons the full Dell order confirmation including the full order details (and more detailed specifications). Please send me an email if you require this. This cost over £400 new, so it's a bargain!

Thanks for your time.

Regards,
Dominic
